justification: Proposal ignores Team B’s likely high valuation of Josh Garcia (rookie, upside, friendly playoff schedule) and their consensus-trusting style. Offering Austin Wright (Tier 5) and a middling TE won’t match B’s priorities. It also clashes with Team A’s conservative, floor-oriented approach by targeting a volatile committee rookie. Explanation is vague and doesn’t distinguish A’s needs from B’s incentives. Trade is structurally feasible but value and motivation fit are poor.
